activities: The Network receives personal information provided during via telephone interviews and through email, letters, and faxes. Employees of our clients, as well as other stakeholders, intentionally provide that information so that The Network can forward incident reports back to our corporate clients. Clients utilize this information to detect, investigate, and resolve workplace issues. The Network compiles data and reports in aggregate (never individually) for trend analysis.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line,  Human Resources, Manually Processed Data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
